mapper.select: /* FeatureRecommendMapper.xml, selectAdminAppList, SAC : 서영배 , 2014-01-03 */ SELECT PROD.* , NVL(ST.DWLD_CNT, 0) DWLD_CNT , NVL(ST.PRCHS_CNT, 0) PRCHS_CNT FROM ( SELECT LP.TENANT_ID , MN.UP_MENU_ID AS TOP_MENU_ID , (SELECT MENU_NM FROM TB_DP_MENU_CATALOG_DESC WHERE MENU_ID = MN.UP_MENU_ID AND LANG_CD = 'ko') TOP_MENU_NM , MN.MENU_ID , (SELECT MENU_NM FROM TB_DP_MENU_CATALOG_DESC WHERE MENU_ID = MN.MENU_ID AND LANG_CD = 'ko') MENU_NM , DP.PROD_ID , AP.META_CLSF_CD , AP.BOOK_CLSF_CD , AP.CHAPTER , CONCAT( PS.PROD_NM , NVL2( AP.BOOK_CLSF_CD , ' '||CONCAT( AP.CHAPTER , DECODE( AP.BOOK_CLSF_CD , 'DP004301', '권' , 'DP004302', '회' , 'DP004303', '호' ) ) , NULL ) ) AS PROD_NM , PS.PROD_BASE_DESC , PR.PROD_AMT , PR.PROD_NET_AMT , PS.ARTIST1_NM , PS.ARTIST2_NM , PS.ARTIST3_NM , DECODE( DP.PROD_GRD_CD , 'PD004401', 0 , 'PD004402', 1 , 'PD004403', 2 , 'PD004404', 4 ) AS PROD_GRD_CD , AP.CHNL_COMP_NM , AP.ISSUE_DAY , AP.BOOK_PAGE_CNT , NVL(AP.EPSD_CNT, 0) EPSD_CNT , NVL(AP.STRM_EPSD_CNT, 0) STRM_EPSD_CNT , AP.CAPTION_YN , ( CASE WHEN AP.META_CLSF_CD = 'CT20' THEN 'serial' END ) AS BOOK_TYPE , ( CASE WHEN AP.META_CLSF_CD = 'CT20' THEN ( AP.EPSD_CNT + AP.STRM_EPSD_CNT ) END ) AS BOOK_COUNT , ( CASE WHEN AP.EPSD_CNT > 0 THEN 'store' END ) AS SUPPORT_STORE , ( CASE WHEN AP.STRM_EPSD_CNT > 0 THEN 'play' END ) AS SUPPORT_PLAY , ( CASE WHEN AP.META_CLSF_CD = 'CT20' THEN DECODE( AP.CAPTION_YN, 'Y', 'completed', 'continue' ) END ) AS BOOK_STATUS , SC.FILE_SIZE AS FILE_SIZE , PI.FILE_PATH || PI.FILE_NM AS FILE_PATH FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD LP, TB_DP_PROD DP, TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE PR, TB_DP_MENU_CATALOG_PROD_MAPG MP, TB_DP_MULTIMDA_PROD AP, TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP, TB_DP_PROD_DESC PS, TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS SC, TB_DP_PROD_IMG PI, TB_DP_MENU_CATALOG MN WHERE LP.LIST_ID LIKE 'ADM%' AND DP.PROD_ID = LP.PROD_ID AND DP.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID AND MP.PROD_ID = DP.PROD_ID AND DP.PROD_ID = AP.PROD_ID AND DP.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND DP.PROD_ID = PS.PROD_ID AND DP.PROD_ID = SC.PROD_ID AND DP.PROD_ID = PI.PROD_ID AND MN.MENU_ID = MP.MENU_ID AND PI.IMG_CD = 'DP000109' AND ROWNUM <= #{count} AND AP.META_CLSF_CD IN ('CT20','CT19') ) PROD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_STATS ST ON PROD.PROD_ID = ST.PROD_ID AND PROD.TENANT_ID = ST.TENANT_ID

/* FeatureRecommendMapper.xml, selectAdminAppList, SAC : 서영배 , 2014-01-03 */ SELECT F_PROD.* , ST.DWLD_CNT , ST.PRCHS_CNT FROM ( SELECT R_PROD.* FROM ( SELECT T_PROD.* , ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) OVER () AS TOTAL_COUNT , TP.TENANT_ID , MN.TOP_MENU_ID , (SELECT MENU_NM FROM TB_DP_MENU_CATALOG_DESC WHERE MENU_ID = MN.UP_MENU_ID AND LANG_CD = #{langCd}) TOP_MENU_NM , MN.MENU_ID , (SELECT MENU_NM FROM TB_DP_MENU_CATALOG_DESC WHERE MENU_ID = MN.MENU_ID AND LANG_CD = #{langCd}) MENU_NM , P1.PROD_ID , AP.AID , PS.PROD_NM , PS.PROD_BASE_DESC , TR.PROD_AMT , P1.PROD_GRD_CD , AP.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD , P1.DRM_YN , SC.APK_PKG_NM , SC.APK_VER , SC.FILE_SIZE , AP.VER_MAJOR , AP.VER_MINOR , PI.FILE_PATH , PI.FILE_NM FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD LP , TB_DP_MENU_CATALOG_PROD_MAPG MP , TB_DP_MENU_CATALOG MN , TB_DP_PROD P1 , TB_DP_PROD_DESC PS , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE TR , TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS SC , TB_DP_APP_PROD AP , TB_DP_PROD_IMG PI , TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE DV , TB_CM_DEVICE CD WHERE LP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND LP.LIST_ID = #{listId} AND LP.PROD_ID = P1.PROD_ID AND P1.PROD_ID = PS.PROD_ID AND PS.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND MN.TOP_MENU_ID = #{topMenuId} AND MN.MENU_ID = MP.MENU_ID AND MP.PROD_ID = P1.PROD_ID AND TP.PROD_ID = P1.PROD_ID AND TP.TENANT_ID = LP.TENANT_ID AND TP.PROD_ID = LP.PROD_ID AND TP.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND TP.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND P1.PROD_ID = SC.PROD_ID AND P1.PROD_ID = AP.PROD_ID AND TP.PROD_ID = TR.PROD_ID AND TP.TENANT_ID = TR.TENANT_ID AND SYSDATE BETWEEN TR.APPLY_START_DT AND TR.APPLY_END_DT AND PI.PROD_ID = P1.PROD_ID AND PI.IMG_CD = 'DP001007' AND SC.PROD_ID = DV.PROD_ID AND SC.SUB_CONTENTS_ID = DV.SUB_CONTENTS_ID AND DV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = CD.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND CD.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} ORDER BY LP.EXPO_ORD , PS.PROD_NM ) T_PROD ) R_PROD WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND (#{offset}+#{count}) ) F_PROD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_STATS ST ON F_PROD.PROD_ID = ST.PROD_ID AND F_PROD.TENANT_ID = ST.TENANT_ID

/* FeatureRecommendMapper.xml, selectAdminAppList, SAC : 서영배 , 2014-01-03 */ SELECT PROD.* , NVL(ST.DWLD_CNT, 0) DWLD_CNT , NVL(ST.PRCHS_CNT, 0) PRCHS_CNT FROM ( SELECT LP.TENANT_ID , MN.UP_MENU_ID AS TOP_MENU_ID , (SELECT MENU_NM FROM TB_DP_MENU_CATALOG_DESC WHERE MENU_ID = MN.UP_MENU_ID AND LANG_CD = 'ko') TOP_MENU_NM , MN.MENU_ID , (SELECT MENU_NM FROM TB_DP_MENU_CATALOG_DESC WHERE MENU_ID = MN.MENU_ID AND LANG_CD = 'ko') MENU_NM , DP.PROD_ID , AP.AID , PS.PROD_NM , PS.PROD_BASE_DESC , PR.PROD_AMT , DECODE( DP.PROD_GRD_CD , 'PD004401', 0 , 'PD004402', 1 , 'PD004403', 2 , 'PD004404', 4 ) AS PROD_GRD_CD , DECODE( AP.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD, 'PD012301', 'iab', NULL ) AS PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD , DECODE( DP.DRM_YN, 'Y', 'drm', NULL ) AS DRM_YN , SC.APK_PKG_NM , SC.APK_VER , SC.FILE_SIZE AS APK_FILE_SIZE , AP.VER_MAJOR||'.'||AP.VER_MINOR AS PROD_VER , PI.FILE_PATH || PI.FILE_NM AS FILE_PATH FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD LP, TB_DP_PROD DP, TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE PR, TB_DP_MENU_CATALOG_PROD_MAPG MP, TB_DP_APP_PROD AP, TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP, TB_DP_PROD_DESC PS, TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS SC, TB_DP_PROD_IMG PI, TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE DV, TB_DP_MENU_CATALOG MN WHERE LP.LIST_ID = 'ADM000000013' AND DP.PROD_ID = LP.PROD_ID AND DP.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID AND MP.PROD_ID = DP.PROD_ID AND DP.PROD_ID = AP.PROD_ID AND DP.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND DP.PROD_ID = PS.PROD_ID AND DP.PROD_ID = SC.PROD_ID AND DP.PROD_ID = PI.PROD_ID AND SC.SUB_CONTENTS_ID = DV.SUB_CONTENTS_ID AND SC.PROD_ID = DV.PROD_ID AND MN.MENU_ID = MP.MENU_ID AND PI.IMG_CD = 'DP000101' AND DV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = 'SCH-W940' AND ROWNUM <= #{count} ) PROD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_STATS ST ON PROD.PROD_ID = ST.PROD_ID AND PROD.TENANT_ID = ST.TENANT_ID
